comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Gertrude V. Whitney had won a competition to design the memorial to victims of the sinking of the Titanic, a memorial eventually completed in 1931 in Washington, D.C. This and the following picture are her models for the memorial. www.dcmemorials.com/index_indiv0001104.htm en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Titanic_Memorial_(Washington,_D.C.) video re history of monument, which was moved in the 60's to make way for the Kennedy Center: www.c-spanvideo.org/program/310623-1
